reviewText: GOOD GAME, especially for the $3 I spent. The slow motion is a pretty cool feature. It takes a couple of waves to get into it, but all in all, it's decent and gets hard as ♥♥♥♥ as the waves get higher.

reviewText: The basic design of the hud and characters is acceptable however the lack of real variety between the weapons and the lack of feedback on the amount of damage is frustrating and the later rounds are simply tedious when even the simplest foe takes several rocket launcher shots.\n\nThe ability to place walls and traps is all but useless as they are far too easily destroyed and cost too much, the units that can be summoned fair little better and the game tends to lag in the later rounds and actually crashed at round 30 for me.
